By adding rule nodes along with start nodes and app nodes, users can add conditional logic that executes different paths. â€‹ Steps to use Rule Node To utilize the Rule Node effectively, follow these steps: 1 Create Workflow Begin by navigating to the respective app and creating a new workflow. Add an event and publish the workflow to make it operational. Learn more about Workflows here . 2 Add Rule Within the workflow, add a rule node as per your requirement along with other nodes to define the workflow flow. 3 Define Rule Condition Configure the rule node by selecting the appropriate rule condition. First, select the Condition Rule for the node which can either be Match Any Condition or Match All Conditions . In Compare Values of , click on + Map Fields and specify the variable , operator and value for the condition. Multiple Conditions can be applied in a single node by clicking on + Map Fields button. The Rule Node offers various Operators or Conditions which you can use based on your requirement. If the specified rule condition is met during execution, the actions to be performed should now be added to the left node connect of Rule node which is for True otherwise connect to the right end.
